Apụl bụ mkpụrụ a na-eri eri nke osisi apụl (Malus domestica) na-emepụta
A na-akọ osisi apụl n'ụwa niile ma bụrụ ụdị ndị a na-akụkarị na genus Malus
Osisi ahụ sitere na Central Asia, ebe a ka na-ahụ nna ochie ya, Malus sieversii, taa
Apụla apụl kemgbe ọtụtụ puku afọ na Eshia na Europe ma ndị na-achị Europe butere ya na North America
Apụl nwere mkpa okpukpe na akụkọ ifo n'ọtụtụ omenala, gụnyere Norse, Greek, na omenala Ndị Kraịst nke Europe.￼
